availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Middaugh and Elizabeth McCullin Middaugh. Resident of Greenup County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 223. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 15. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 30.
